name: Global Performance Group
description: Global Performance Group implements behavior change approaches to help today’s busy business professionals and leaders develop the skills, tools and confidence necessary to take control of every interaction, both internally and externally, and drive it to a successful outcomes.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Engage. Provoke. Transform.
ShortDescription: Global Performance Group is a globally recognized behavioral transformation company.
enhanced_description: Global Performance Group is a globally recognized behavioral transformation company that implements customized behavior change approaches and sales coaching. Their programs are designed to help business professionals and leaders develop essential skills, tools, and confidence to drive successful interactions, both internally and externally. The core objective is to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, accelerate the acquisition of top talent more efficiently, and reduce the overall cost of hiring qualified employees. They operate within the Recruiting and Talent Management domains, functioning as HR consulting and staffing services providers.

Developing skills and confidence in business interactions
Boosting hiring manager effectiveness and productivity
Accelerating talent acquisition processes to hire top talent faster
Optimizing hiring processes to reduce associated costs

Strategic approach to talent acquisition through human behavior modification and coaching
